welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint-Mande, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free and unlimited access throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
